to stay hydrated and do the

You can buy a pair of support 
stockings in the pharmacy over 
the counter, which will reduce 
leg swelling.
Before you travel, think about 
your destination. Could you get 
medical help if you needed it? 
Are any immunisations needed 
which might be harmful in 
pregnancy?
Safety on the move
Road accidents are among 
the most common causes of 
injury in pregnant wome
